text: Preview Streamers There are various machines that provide preview for the TUIO application on the desktop of the touch PCs. The streamer IP address is set in the TUIO app, under Streamer HTTP Address. The port is 1234. If the preview is missing after opening TUIO, the streaming application may not be running. Log into the streamer, if the software is not running, open it, "JpegStreamService". The Capture Device should be set to "Decklink Video Capture", and the Format set to "1920x1080 @ 29.97." Once you see the input here, it will appear on the TUIO app.
